data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Meegaskumbura, Madhava, Manamendra-Arachchi, Kelum, Schneider, Christopher J., Pethiyagoda, And Rohan (2007): New species amongst Sri Lanka’s extinct shrub frogs (Amphibia: Rhacophoridae: Philautus). Zootaxa 1397: 1-15, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175351
